General.Name: Taiwan Alpha Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Alpha Electronic Co., Ltd. provides electronic components and sensor solutions. It offers membrane sensors, such as stretch, force, insole pressure, bending detection, position, force + position sensors, as well as pressure sensor arrays, sensor kits, force-sensing resistor foils; rotary and slide potentiometers; switches; and encoders for industry and logistics, health and fitness, lighting, automotive, home appliance, and pro audio applications. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1221, Zhongzheng Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 330010
